title: Did I Need $6,000 Princeton Carbonworks Tri-Spoke Wheels to Get the KOM?
content:
Would uber expensive tri-spoke Princeton Carbonworks Mach 7580 TSV2 wheels snag me the KOM on a popular Strava segment?

Read the full article at Did I Need $6,000 Princeton Carbonworks Tri-Spoke Wheels to Get the KOM? on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
